name: CMS SFMC Connector
description: The quickest and easiest way to move CMS content to Marketing Cloud

CONSUMER_KEY.description: Get it from Salesforce Connected App's Consumer Key.

CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Get it from Salesforce Connected App's Consumer Secret.

SF_SECURITY_TOKEN.description: Get it from Salesforce personal settings, enter Reset in the Quick Find box, then select Reset My Security Token.

MC_CLIENT_ID.description: Get it from Marketing Cloud Installed Package's Client Id.

MC_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Get it from Marketing Cloud Installed Package's Client Secret.

MC_AUTHENTICATION_BASE_URI.description: Get it from Marketing Cloud Installed Package's Authentication Base URI.

MC_REST_BASE_URI.description: Get it from Marketing Cloud Installed Package's Rest Base URI.
